headline: Parks Associates Forecasts the Market for Smart Thermostats Will Reach Unit Sales of 8.1 million in 2030, with Annual Revenues Exceeding $1.1 billion
summary: Parks Associates' latest market assessment, Smart Thermostat Market Assessment 2025, forecasts that smart thermostat sales will grow over the next five years. In 2030, the US market for smart thermostats is projected to achieve sales of 8.1 million units, with annual revenues exceeding $1.1 billion. Current adoption of current smart thermostats is 16-17% of US internet households, and the top smart thermostat brands purchased in the last year are Google Nest and Honeywell Home.

headline: The Top 5 Analyst Questions From Resideo’s Q2 Earnings Call
summary: Resideo’s second quarter saw a positive market reaction as the company delivered results ahead of Wall Street expectations, driven by strong demand for new products and effective execution in both its ADI distribution and Products & Solutions segments. Management attributed the performance to higher volumes in commercial security, fire, and professional audio/video products, as well as robust sales of Honeywell Home FocusPRO thermostats and First Alert smoke detectors. headline: Functional Safety Market Set to Surpass $7,896.7 Million by 2029 Amid Rising Demand for Risk Mitigation
summary: Delray Beach, FL, Aug. 12, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- According to the new market research report "Functional Safety Market by Safety Sensors (Emergency Stop, Temperature, Pressure, Gas), Safety Light Curtain, Safety Controller, Programmable Safety System, Safety Switches, TIC Analysis Type (Fault & Event Analysis), Robotics – Global Forecast to 2029" The global functional safety market will USD 7,896.7 million by 2029 from USD 5,883.4 million by 2024, at a CAGR of 6.1% during the forecast period.
